title: ReportStream makes it easier to send and collect public health data — for free
summary: ReportStream is an open source, cloud based platform that aggregates and delivers reportable disease test results to health departments
description: Get faster, more accurate data directly from testing facilities, labs, and more — through a single connection.
heroImgAlt: Example screenshot of the ReportStream web application

sections.title: Why ReportStream?
sections.summary: Get faster, more accurate data directly from testing facilities, labs, and more — through a single connection

features.title: Aggregated, clean data
features.summary: Get aggregated, validated test results from across your jurisdiction, all through a single connection.

features.title: Analytics and insights
features.summary: Get insights on reporting trends and real-time alerts that help you inform and manage your reportable disease response.

features.title: A built-in network
features.summary: ReportStream works directly with disease test manufacturers, labs, and apps like SimpleReport to deliver more results to public health departments across the U.S.

features.title: Safe and secure
features.summary: Test results and patient data are securely stored and protected by two-factor authentication, database encryption, and HTTPS.

features.title: Free and created by the CDC
features.summary: Developed for disease test data and public health departments, ReportStream is 100% free.

sections.title: ReportStream offers two ways to deliver data directly to your public health department
sections.summary: Log in and download test results quickly through our web application, or work with ReportStream to set up a customized ELR connection

features.title: 1. Data download
features.summary: Log in and download test results quickly through our web application
features.imgAlt: Diagram showing simplified point-to-point ELR connections

items.title: Set up made simple
items.summary: Get verified, then simply log in to download data from our online portal. Give your team access to data from anyone in your jurisdiction that's connected to ReportStream.

items.title: Industry standard data formatting
items.summary: Save time with less manual data entry. Download daily data in standard HL7 or CSV format in minutes, without setting up an ELR.

features.title: 2. Electronic lab reporting
features.summary: Work with ReportStream to set up a customized ELR connection
features.imgAlt: Example screenshot of the ReportStream web application

items.title: Centralize your connections
items.summary: Get data from multiple testing facilities — in less time —  through a single connection.

items.title: Customized, clean data
items.summary: ReportStream works 1:1 with public health departments to make sure data arrives in the format you need, when you need it.

liveMapContact.title: Where is ReportStream live?
liveMapContact.summary: ReportStream partners with health departments, test manufacturers, data aggregators, and others across the U.S.
liveMapContact.description: We're growing quickly. Take a look at the complete list of ReportStream partners.

features.imgAlt: Map of the U.S. showing states and territories where ReportStream is currently live

liveMapContact.title: Interested in learning more about ReportStream?
liveMapContact.summary: Either way, if you send or analyze reportable disease data, we'd like to help.
liveMapContact.description: ReportStream works with public health departments looking to get better quality disease data from jurisdictions. We also collaborate with testing facilities, data aggregators, manufacturers, and more to send test results to health departments.
liveMapContact.buttonUrlSubject: ?subject=I'm interested in learning more about ReportStream
